text: I understand the flaws and critics, though I personally enjoyed the ride, it's very rare to see a female lead in this genre and that attracted my attention, and even though Snyder doesn't have a record of well written female characters, it turned out to be a nice protagonist, for me, its best female character in his career. My biggest disappointment was finding out that this is not even the uncut version, which is obvious, specially in the action scenes and I do feel that it affects not only the narrative but the visuals. The rest of the characters are undeniably plain and the world does feel a bit reduced, but I feel like I got enough for the first installment of a franchise that it's supposed to go beyond 2 films, and I understand the story because of personal reasons which might be the main reason why I actually enjoyed it, along with the visuals.

title: A true masterpiece!
text: This was such an incredible movie, a true masterpiece, and filled with action. It's been a long time that someone delivered a high standing movie like this one is. All the actors, the scenes, the plot, the complete story was very well thought out. I want to congratulate the whole team and actors for their performance! This made the end of 2023 an exceptional final! Looking forward to see part 2 soon. I'm a big fan of sci-fi action movies, and this ranked easily in my top 10 of all time favorites, next to Alien, Terminator, The Thing, etc.. Don't believe the other comments that crack down on the movie.

title: Very good visual effects and acting
text: I really don't understand the bad reviews I saw...the movie is great, more than acceptable in terms of story, dialogues, acting and the visuals, the fights just wawooh! Sofia Botella is just brillant, the fights scenes with her are amazing and remembers me a lot when she played a bad ass in the first Kingsman. The evil guy is scary and the progress of the rebellion is exciting to see...You are so deeply in the movie that you just want Sofia Botella to kick the asses of all the oppressors in that story. She is a real and believable heroe. You will not waste your time watching that amazing movie.

title: Worth watching
text: Enjoyed this movie. It feels like Star Wars (original episodes) at times. At other times it feels like the legendary Seven Samurai. Either way it feels different from most things I've seen.The pacing is nice and the plot moves along at a leisurely pace. The fighting sequences are really cool and plenty of gore... not a movie for kids. The soundtrack sounds epic. The CGI is amazing.The acting and actors is top notch, better than most blockbuster movies I've watched in the last few years. Can't wait to see the rest of this story.I see a lot of people nit picking this movie but give it a watch and judge for yourself. So far I love it.

title: i like it for a beginning but i would rather see it in a tv series
text: Movie is a good sci fi movie , enjoyable with some twist i think its a good sci fi movie star warish with its own unique feel this is way better than the previous star wars movies. I just hope it was made as a tv series it seems the movies story was shorten and summarize it looks like it was rushed maybe bec there is an extended version of this . But over all i think its a solid 8 or 9 for me, enjoyable, it has more potential , it was just shorten it looks really rushed the story is like jumping no character groowth except for the woman lead. I hope the extended version is way better to understand it more and to enjoy it more . It should be an 8 or 9 for me.

title: I absolutely love this movie........... but .....
text: I've seen this movie easy 100+ times now, I absolutely love it!The only reason I dropped one star is I feel they edited to many things out. I've read the book a few times over now so understand where all the missing bits are and why certain things are there/not there.For me, the only thing that spoils the movie is the fact that so much was edited out.I can't wait for part 2 but more so can't wait for the director's cuts in the summer, I think these will be absolutely amazing.Awesome movie but I fee that reading the book is a must in order to understand certain characters and story lines.

title: Rebel Moon is a great start for a new universe on Netflix..
text:
Visionary Zack Snyder is back again after a long break to show us why he is the one on the best filmmakers of our generation. From mythalogical refrences to some mystical elements blended with sci fi and fantasy, A Child of Fire captures everything Snyder is best at. Say whatever you wanna say about Snyder's direction but no one can deny when it comes to cinematography and visuals no one can beat his style and same goes for this movie from opening shot you'll know that this movie is a feast to your eyes, from multiple cgi creatures to different worlds to big set pieces everything is so well done..with big spaceships, weapons, lighting blades, laser guns and epic action scenes you can really see the production value of this movie..
Junkie XL's score is also great to hear, he never misses with his soundtrack..
Storywise it is similar to many films we've seen in the past i will call it Magnificent Seven meets with Justice League where multiple heroes form a team to defeat the evil,but since it is only buildup for what's to come we really can't say what Snyder is really cooking. It is getting the band together story with the actual main event loading to explode in sequel. Every cast member played his/her role too well especially Charlie Hunnam and Sofia Boutella, she was 🔥as Kora and i am interested to see how will her journey in this universe will take her. Rest of cast also done justice to their characters..Action scenes were really epic especially final battle since Snyder is best known for delivering epic slo mo action scenes we can easily say it is one of the best action films of this year.. With an extended cut for this movie is coming next year sometimes it suffers from pacing issues which will be resloved in that 3hr cut i think.. Overall it was a great fun to watch.I am waiting to see part 2 in April next year and excited to see where it will take us..On December 22 2023 as DCEU finally dies a shameful death Zack Snyder's new universe rises on Netflix.. I call that poetic justice..

title: Solid Scifi
text: Awesome combat scenes. Great effects. Fantastic acting. I enjoyed this movie more than I have enjoyed any sci fi in a long while. A heroine in the line of Xena, and lots of shirtless man candy. Honestly have been waiting for years. The choreography in the fight scenes is unparalleled- hats off to the actors and martial artists working those moves. Superb sword play.This movie franchise will develope one hell of a cult following. It has everything nerdlings could want from a production!Here's hoping to see 9 installments of this Zack. We all know the value in a franchise like this will only Blossom with viewership over time.Really great flick.

title: Overly Critical IMDB Reviews
text: Story was solid, acting was above par in my estimation. The production quality was high and the cast was impressive. It is already hard enough to get an "epic" sci-fi movie (Star Wars original trilogy will never have an equal, obviously). But with the very good hand to hand spots, very unique technology and aliens it all lead to a very promising future franchise. So far there is no great backstory such as the great war between the Sith and Jedi, however no story before or since can equal that. This movie kept my sons (17 and 23), and even my wife entertained the duration of the movie. I have never been a movie snob, and getting original stories is almost impossible. The writing was adequate, the plot was good enough. The acting was good and the action with the humanoids and the unique aliens and weapons just made a very high budget movie, we got to see for free on Netflix.Not a writer, nor a professional reviewer. Apologies for the write-up, but the movie is more than worth a watch.

title: A typical snyder movie
text: I have always been a fan of Zack Snyder and the way he makes movies. I am really getting that Warhammer 40k, Star Wars vibes while wathcing these movies and I like it. It is dark, grim and a cinematic visual spectacle. The music is astounding and I can see the Snyder aestatics in the movie, as in the movies 300 and the Justice League Snyder Cut. I guess it is not for everyone, but it was definetly something new out there that is worth to watch. There are too few movies about an epic space opera on such a scale like this. It has a lot of potential and it had me eager to see more of the world and characters.

title: Sci-fi Magnificent Seven
text: Thoroughly enjoyable film. You quickly catch on that this is a "Magnificent Seven/Seven Samurai" type of film. A little heavy handed on the slowmo scenes but that's kinda to be expected with Zach Snyder. Good variety of action, choreographed fight scenes, and battles. Storyline is basic but still serviceable and that's really all you need for an action movie. Good acting overall. Nice setup for the second film.Bottom line: if you're looking for a highly enjoyable action movie with good CGI and some heart, then this is well worth your time. It was a great setup for the second movie, which luckily for us, is already available to stream.

title: I liked it
text: I liked it, despite what the other people say. My boyfriend saw it too, but one week later. He liked it too. I was looking for a film with this theme for a while and finally it came out. I like the way Kora (Sophia Boutella) fights, i like the story itself. I am very curious what follows next.I would recommend other people not to trust other people's reviews and watch the movie for themselves. When i saw the mark on IMDB i was almost about to give up watching the movie. Good that I followed my instinct/ curiosity.It is a good movie in my opinion, maybe not wow, but it is good and has potential to turn into smth super coolGo go Rebel Moon!I and my boyfriend, we are both looking forward to see the second part.

title: You need to judge this film for what it is, content filler for a streaming service
text: This is a nice bit of eye candy to chill out with, curled up on your chair with a pile of treats to nibble on. This film is produced wanting to rub it's shoulders with the big Hollywood productions, I feel that it has achieved a high result with the budget it has been given. As a Netflix funded film, it uses the funding tricks of the big budget film and has managed to get the post production teams many a director would give a body part for and uses all these resources to the max.To sum up, I feel it's a good curl up with film. Nice eye candy which is easy to watch. Yes, it's not a Hollywood masterpiece, but worth the effort to watch it.Thumbs up 😉

title: I don't why people are so angry with this movie
text: Reading the reviews I thought the movie would be one of the worst I've ever watched. Even so, I watched this movie and it can not be the movie of the year, but it is very far from being a bad movie. I urge you to watch and evaluate by yourself, because in my opinion, people are being an little unfair to this movie, it simple doesn't make sense people criticizing that much. The history may not be awesome, but the visual effects, the actors, sounds...they're pretty awesome. I really don't know why the movie is being down voted like that. Perhaps some people don't like Zack Snyder style or there is something going on this movie that I'm not aware of, but I think the movie worths watching.

title: Solid movie
text: This was an entertaining movie and a good watch. I agree with many other reviews that the feel of this movie is a cross between star wars and dune. It offered a really strong antagonist that you just grow to dislike and a protagonist you find yourself cheering for. I found myself several times having that feeling of dread when you feel all is lost and the cheer with the victories that come with such a movie. I realize there are many criticisms on lack of plot and character development, I respectfully disagree it's a great watch. I will admit it's not as singularly epic as Dune or Star wars alone but it's an excellent film.

title: Save yourself some time!
text: Remember when you first discovered animations in Powerpoint and you decided every slide needed animations, and lots of them.Well imagine seeing all the popular scifi series and films just before deciding to make one and then taking all the ideas from those and creating this.Yes a couple of big names and some fancy CGI help but overall its basically A Bugs Life in space that heavily 'borrows' content from everywhere else.Assembling the band of 'good guys' was pretty much turn up, watch someone do something, ask them to come along, if they say No, wait a minute and ask again.And this is only part 1? What will they do in part 2, fly a time machine to the Deathstar while saving humanity from the cylons only to discover their future was caused by uploading a virus to an alien spacecraft?
